title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Biden town hall beats Trump by 2 million in early ratings, but it's understandable, because nobody ever gets to see Plugs. ABC's town hall was softball. NBC's Savannah Guthrie was under pressure to grill Trump and she came through. QAnon. Trump doesn't want to be critical of groups who support him. Guthrie bombed trying to nail Trump on finances. Caller thinks Trump supporters watched Biden to see if he'd be asked about Hunter -- he wasn't. People had trouble finding Trump town hall on some NBC affiliates. TikTok users tried to boost Biden ratings. Rudy: Hunter Biden's lawyers inadvertently confirmed it was his client's hard drive. Biden used his influence in Washington to get jobs for his family. Polls begin to close.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Trafalgar poll shows race tightening. Early voting numbers in battleground states not bad for Republicans as they seem to be every year. Polling firms are using registered voters, Obama electorate turnout numbers. Young people never come out to vote. Replace Rock the Vote with Rock the Oldies. Michigan tightening. Biden losing ground daily in IBD poll, the most accurate poll in 2016. Caller on why more watched Biden. Will anthem kneeling continue after the election? GOP up in early voting in NC. Sports leagues are going to have to redo their business model, ditch BLM support. NBA gets it, NFL still clueless. Suburban wife, ‘80s metal head thinks Trump will win big, despite not sounding like a politician. People upset when Republicans are caricatured as not smart.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Republicans are always caricatured as dumb. Seattle police vehicle set on fire with police officers in it. Speak out and support law enforcement heroes. Rush Store drive to raise money for law enforcement. Rush and Kathryn donate an additional $500,000. RNC claims Twitter has violated campaign finance law by banning NY Post story on Hunter Biden. Savannah Guthrie. Why Rush doesn't like concerts. Trump speech to seniors in Florida. Luntz focus group on town halls. Dana Bash on Savannah Guthrie. The WHO helps Biden. Trump shows empathy for seniors. Caller thinks Trump has to explain details on preexisting conditions and healthcare. Amazon kills Shelby Steele documentary to appease BLM.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
